Newbie Guide:
Upper and lower body armor are classified as either Robes, Light Gear or Heavy Gear. Kamael use Light Gear.
When you transfer your profession at level 20, the armor you wear will influence your choice of skills. For example, Light Armor Mastery is a skill which increases defense power and evasion.
But you are only considered to be equipped with a given type of armor if both your upper and lower body is equipped with the same armor type. In other word, the Light Armor Mastery works only when you wear Light Gear on both your upper and lower body.
Your helmet, gloves and other gear do not affect it, so wear what you wish.
